meanings.definition: A person who is honored or celebrated.
meanings.sent1: The honorand received a medal for bravery.
meanings.sent2: The community gathered to celebrate the honorand's achievements.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the honorand was the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: The honorand shone brightly among the crowd of guests.
meanings.sent5: Everyone cheered for the honorand as they walked on stage.

meanings.definition: To honor or pay tribute to someone.
meanings.sent1: They decided to honorand their teacher with a surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The school will honorand the top students at the graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The children planned to honorand their parents by cooking dinner.
meanings.sent4: The company will honorand its employees for their hard work.
meanings.sent5: The town will honorand the local hero with a statue in the park.
